name: Vegan Donuts Recipe with Chocolate Glaze
description: Easy Vegan Donuts Recipe with Chocolate Glaze. Classic Vegan Doughnut. Chocolate Glazed Doughnut. Easy, quick and fun. Simple Baked Vanilla Donut Recipe. Vegan Soy-free. Makes 6 to 8.
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp coconut oil (refined for neutral flavor or use other oil)
a generous pinch of nutmeg and cinnamon
1/2 cup vegan semi sweet chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc. Grease a doughnut pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc. Grease a doughnut pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm non dairy milk and maple and sugar in a saucepan or in a bowl in the microwave. The mixture should be jut warm to touch. Mix well to combine the sugar. Add yeast and mix in. Let sit for 5 mins to activate. Add oil, vanilla, spices and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm non dairy milk and maple and sugar in a saucepan or in a bowl in the microwave. The mixture should be jut warm to touch. Mix well to combine the sugar. Add yeast and mix in. Let sit for 5 mins to activate. Add oil, vanilla, spices and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add flours, baking powder, salt and whisk well to make a smooth batter. Let the batter sit for 10 mins. It should increase in volume. Transfer to a ziplock. Snip one of the ends of the bag and pour into greased donut pan. Or use a spoon to fill the greased doughnut pan. I usually like to fill them a bit more than half to make thinner donuts rather than very tall results. Let the batter sit for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add flours, baking powder, salt and whisk well to make a smooth batter. Let the batter sit for 10 mins. It should increase in volume. Transfer to a ziplock. Snip one of the ends of the bag and pour into greased donut pan. Or use a spoon to fill the greased doughnut pan. I usually like to fill them a bit more than half to make thinner donuts rather than very tall results. Let the batter sit for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 11 to 12 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 11 to 12 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for a minute. Tap to release, cool completely before adding a glaze.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for a minute. Tap to release, cool completely before adding a glaze.

recipeInstructions.text: Dip in prepared glaze and let it sit in a cool place for a few minutes to set. Serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Dip in prepared glaze and let it sit in a cool place for a few minutes to set. Serve.

itemListElement.text: Mix the sugar and milk over medium heat. Add oil and mix in. Take off heat. Add chocolate and let it sit for a minute. Whisk to melt until smooth. Dip the doughnuts to coat, or drizzle the chocolate on the doughnuts.
itemListElement.name: Mix the sugar and milk over medium heat. Add oil and mix in. Take off heat. Add chocolate and let it sit for a minute. Whisk to melt until smooth. Dip the doughnuts to coat, or drizzle the chocolate on the doughnuts.
